Contact Us
/$
$
Baia Beach Club is committed to providing all of our members and guests with comfort, care, and outstanding service. Do you have any questions about Baia Beach Club? Get in touch with us at
info@baiabeachclubmiami.com
or call (305) 514-1949.
​
Careers
Baia Beach Club offers exciting career opportunities for driven and motivated professionals. Our team members are the most important part of providing unparalleled service to members and guests. With competitive compensation and opportunities for promotion, we make sure that our staff has every opportunity to grow professionally and personally.

/$
$
$
Group Dining and Private Events
/$
$
Baia Beach Club is a unique waterfront social dining and private event venue in Miami, offering a variety of indoor / outdoor spaces ideal for private events and group gatherings. We offer a range of group dining menus and beverage packages that can be customized to meet your needs. Below is an at-a-glance look at our private dining rooms.
​
We remain dedicated to ensuring a safe environment for your gathering to take place as we continue to navigate the ‘new normal.’ It is our commitment to you to ensure that we continue to create unparalleled occasions and provide the highest level of experience for our clients and guests.
​
While the information below provides an overview of our venues, we encourage you to enquire with us directly to discuss the details of your booking so that we can provide you with the most accurate information that we have to-date in regards to group gatherings.
/$
$
INQUIRE FOR MORE INFORMATION
/$
$
BAIA EVENTS GUIDE
/$
$
HOLIDAY EVENTS PROMOTION
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Baia Restaurant and Terrace
/$
$
Baia Restaurant is available for private or semi-private hire, featuring an indoor dining room with sliding glass doors to the open air, and an outdoor terrace. The venue can be booked together for seated gatherings of up to 80 guests combined, or standing receptions of up to 150 combined.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
The Deck
/$
$
The Deck is available for private hire, available for seating of up to 130 guests, and for a standing reception of up to 150 guests.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
The Lounge
/$
$
The Lounge is located inside at Baia restaurant and can be available for private hire for a standing reception of up to 120 guests. The Lounge is also a great feature as a pre-function cocktail venue for a seated dinner at Baia Restaurant and Terrace.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Sunset Bar
&
Terrace
/$
$
The Sunset Bar and Terrace is situated alongside the Baia Beach Club pool, nestled under a trellis filled with lush greenery. The Sunset Bar and Terrace is the ideal venue for an outdoor cocktail reception with sunset views for up to 130 guests standing.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
The Green House
/$
$
The Green House is our private dining room with waterfront views, offering the option to dine behind the glass-enclosed door, or leave them open to the bay breeze. The Green House is available for a variety of group sizes and styles of seated and standing gatherings for up to 50 guests.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
